raw_text: FERNANDOPULLE Dr JBT (Homeopathic Doctor and Retd. Senior Asst. Director,​ Central Bank of Sri Lanka). Beloved husband of Scholastica,​ loving father of Dushan (USA),​ Niroshan,​ Shamila (Airport and Aviation,​ Katunayake) and Shivanthi (ex Seylan Bank),​ father-in-law of Poornima (USA) and Dhanuka (Director,​ Lanka Florists),​ loving grandfather of Thinuk. Cortege leaves residence at 3.30 p.m. on Wednesday the 4th of October for Burial at RC Cemetery,​ Welihena. 234/​1,​ Welihena,​ Kochchikade.062224

PERERA – HARINDA (H.C.). (Habib Bank). Dearly beloved husband of Saruchi and father of Mireya,​ brother of Aruni,​ brother-in-law of Suren,​ Jithendra and Ruwanthi,​ son of late Indra and Chintha. Cortege leaves residence on 4th October at 4.15 p.m. Cremation at General Cemetery Kanatte at 5.00 p.m. The remains will be at 50/​3,​ Siripa Road,​ Colombo 5.062359
